typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	File as string ('entry_1201.json'),
	Directory as string,
	ExecutionDate as timestamp,
	RunId as string
}
source(output(
		EntryID as long,
		CategoryID as long,
		EventID as long,
		ContactID as long,
		EntryStatusEnum as long,
		AddressTypeID as long,
		BookingID as long,
		EntryApplicationID as long,
		PinNumber as long,
		PortalEmail as string,
		PortalAuthProviderUserID as string,
		ConferenceEmail as string,
		NameLast as string,
		NameFirst as string,
		NameTitle as string,
		NamePreferred as string,
		NameWeb as string,
		NameOther as string,
		NameInitials as string,
		NameSharer as string,
		GenderEnum as long,
		Birth_GenderEnum as long,
		DirectoryFlagPrivacy as boolean,
		DOB as string,
		Position as string,
		ID1 as string,
		ID2 as string,
		ID3 as string,
		ID4 as long,
		ID5 as long,
		PhoneProcessToAccount as boolean,
		PhoneChargeTypeID as long,
		PhoneDisableValue as double,
		PhoneRestrictValue as double,
		PhoneControlEnum as long,
		TaxExemptionEnum as long,
		LastCheckInOutDate as string,
		Previous_EntryStatusEnum as long,
		Testing as boolean,
		User_SecurityUserID as long,
		SecurityUserID as long,
		CreatedBy_SecurityUserID as long,
		DateCreated as string,
		DateModified as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StructuredFile
source(output(
		EntryID as long,
		CategoryID as long,
		EventID as long,
		ContactID as long,
		EntryStatusEnum as long,
		AddressTypeID as long,
		BookingID as long,
		EntryApplicationID as long,
		PinNumber as long,
		PortalEmail as string,
		PortalAuthProviderUserID as string,
		ConferenceEmail as string,
		NameLast as string,
		NameFirst as string,
		NameTitle as string,
		NamePreferred as string,
		NameWeb as string,
		NameOther as string,
		NameInitials as string,
		NameSharer as string,
		GenderEnum as long,
		Birth_GenderEnum as long,
		DirectoryFlagPrivacy as boolean,
		DOB as string,
		Position as string,
		ID1 as string,
		ID2 as string,
		ID3 as string,
		ID4 as long,
		ID5 as long,
		PhoneProcessToAccount as boolean,
		PhoneChargeTypeID as long,
		PhoneDisableValue as double,
		PhoneRestrictValue as double,
		PhoneControlEnum as long,
		TaxExemptionEnum as long,
		LastCheckInOutDate as string,
		Previous_EntryStatusEnum as long,
		Testing as boolean,
		User_SecurityUserID as long,
		SecurityUserID as long,
		CreatedBy_SecurityUserID as long,
		DateCreated as string,
		DateModified as string,
		HASH as string,
		ExecutionStatus as string,
		ExecutionCreatedDate as timestamp,
		ExecutionModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ExecutionLogId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['entry']) ~> CurrentLookup
StructuredFile derive(HASH = md5(columns()),
		ExecutionStatus = 'INSERT',
		ExecutionCreatedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionModifiedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionLogId = $RunId) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns, CurrentLookup exists(AddColumns@HASH == CurrentLookup@HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat($Directory, toString(hour(currentUTC())), toString(minute(currentUTC())), '.parquet'))],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CurrentSink
